arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" AS \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" AS \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" AS \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" AS \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" AS \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" AS \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"PRODUCT_TYP\\" AS \\"PRODUCT_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\" AS \\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\") AS \\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\") AS \\"LOT_NUMBERING_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" AS \\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" " +"FROM " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\"), 'TM9') " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"DEFECT_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\", " +" M_WH.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ONEROUS_FLG\\" as \\"ONEROUS_FLG\\" " +"from " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?) " +"order by " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" desc"

"select " +" to_char(T_LOT_STOCK.STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY, 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY, " +" to_char(T_LOT_STOCK.DEFECT_QTY, 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as DEFECT_QTY, " +" to_char((T_LOT_STOCK.STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY - T_LOT_STOCK.ALCD_QTY), 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as ALLOCABLE_QTY " +"from " +" T_LOT_STOCK " +"where " +" T_LOT_STOCK.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_STOCK.WH_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_STOCK.LOT_NO = ?"
"select " +" T_LOT_CTRL.\\"LOT_NO\\" as \\"LOT_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_LOT_CTRL " +"where " +" T_LOT_CTRL.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_LOT_CTRL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" NVL(CASE WHEN TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD')> T_LOT_CTRL.\\"BEST_BEFORE_DATE\\" THEN '1' ELSE '0' END, 0) BBD_c_FLG " +"FROM " +" T_LOT_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM " +"WHERE " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_CD = T_LOT_CTRL.ITEM_CD " +" AND T_LOT_CTRL.\\"LOT_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_LOT_CTRL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +""
